programme.title: A Dangerous Woman
programme.desc: Martha Horgan is mentally slow. She lives with her aunt Frances. She is known for NEVER lying. This.

programme.title: Pulp
programme.desc: Michael Caine portrays a writer of cheap novels, who dubiously takes on the job of writing the biography of an actor who specialized in playing gangsters...only to find himself the murder target of a real gangster

programme.title: Heartbreakers
programme.desc: Now in their thirties, two childhood friends find their relationship severely tested when each is suddenly caught up in his own fervent drive for success

programme.title: A Prayer For The Dying
programme.desc: Martin Fallon is an IRA bomber who tries to blow up a troop truck but instead kills a bus load of school children.

programme.title: Fargo
programme.desc: Malvo flips the script on the blackmail operation, Molly sets a trap, and Gus debates whether he should come clean. Lester's return to work has complicated repercussions

programme.title: Stone Cold Dead
programme.desc: Based on Hugh Garner's novel "Sin Sniper," this police drama follows Sergeant Boyd's police search to find the sniper who has been shooting hookers

programme.title: Američka pita 5: Gola milja
American pie presents the naked mile
programme.desc: Iako Eric (John White) nosi prezime Stifler, još uvijek je djevac. Nije lako biti članom obitelji Stifler, a ne osjetiti čari ljubavnog života. Štoviše, nema naznaka da će se u Ericovom životu išta promijeniti jer njegova djevojka Tracy (Jessy Schram) nije spremna na seks. No bitna joj je njegova sreća i daje mu dozvolu da preko vikenda radi što mu srce poželi. S dopuštenjem da se provede kao nikad u životu, Eric i prijatelji se pridružuju “Goloj milji”, utrci u kojoj su sudionici posve goli i koja se održava u dvorištu sveučilišta. Ukoliko želite brojeve, recimo da je “Gola milja” peti od ukupno sedam nastavaka “Američke pite”. Ta činjenica serijal svrstava u najomiljeniju tinejdžersku TV zabavu ovog desetljeća, no to je manje bitno. Važnija je činjenica da će se gledatelji, koji su specifičan tinejdžerski humor kakav pruža „Američka pita“ i raskalašeno društvo sa samo jednom stvari na pameti, sjajno zabaviti i ovoga puta

programme.title: Doyleova republika
Republic of Doyle
programme.desc: Mala i Rose angažiraju da štite starog prijatelja, no da bi otkrili što ga dovodi u opasnost, moraju istražiti njegov složeni radni život

programme.title: Rođeni policajci
Blue Bloods
programme.desc: Danny istražuje ubojstvo 10-godišnjaka, dok je Frank uključen u slučaj mlade Turkinje koja se suočava s progonom

programme.title: Rođeni policajci
Blue Bloods
programme.desc: Danny pomaže Erin u istrazi starog slučaja djevojke ubijene 1998., za koju se misli da ju je ubio dečko

programme.title: Plava krv (2010)
Blue Bloods
programme.desc: Danny istražuje par koji je opljačkao banku u stilu Bonnie i Clydea. Erin napada fotografa

programme.title: Plava krv (2010)
Blue Bloods
programme.desc: Danny traži vezu između naizgled nepovezanih žrtava ubojstva, Jamie upoznaje dječaka iz neskladne obitelji, a Frank pomaže prijatelju alkoholičaru(c)

programme.title: Borba božićnih žaruljica
The Battle of the Bulbs
programme.desc: Nakon što su godinama imali najbolje okićenu kuću za Božić, obitelj Wallace ima konkurenciju u novom susjedu, starom srednjoškolskom suparniku

programme.title: Beethoven 4
Beethoven's 4th
programme.desc: U obitelji Newton sve bi bilo u najboljem redu da svaki dan nered ne radi njihov kućni ljubimac. To je, naravno, bernardinac Beethoven koji tatu Richarda (J. Reinhold) izluđuje raznoseći smeće po kući, a mamu Beth (J. Sweeney) uništavajući njezine putne kovčege. I dok ljutita Beth namjerava Beethovena poslati na farmu izvan grada, njezino dvoje djece Brennan (J. Pichler) i Sara (M. Gallo) smišljaju kako Beethovena naučiti lijepom ponašanju. To im neočekivano pođe za rukom kada se živahni pas zamijeni sa svojom slikom i prilikom Michelangelom iz bogataške obitelji Sedgewick. Michelangelo je, naime, iznimno miran i dobro odgojen pas te se Newtonovi nađu u čudu koliko se Beethoven promijenio. Isto pomisle i Sedgewickovi kada im se u kuću useli nemogući Beethoven... Ono što je među škotskim ovčarima Lassie, to je među bernardincima Beethoven. Započet 1992., filmski serijal o dražesnom i nestašnom bernardincu Beethovenu stigao je 2001. do svog četvrtog nastavka. Ovaj film režirao je kao i treći dio David Mickey Evans (Ed, First Kid), dok se scenarist John Loy (animirane serije Štrumfovi i Zemlja daleke prošlosti) nadahnuo klasičnim romanom Kraljević i prosjak Marka Twaina. Reinterpretacija dobro poznate priče o zamjeni identiteta, uz neizbježni kriminalistički podzaplet, zaživjela je u Evansovu filmu na dopadljiv i zabavan način pri čemu su simpatije publike na strani neodoljivog bernardinca i njegova mirnog dvojnika. Film je okupio gotovo istu glumačku ekipu kao i u prethodnom nastavku te tako Richarda Newtona tumači glumac J. Reinhold (Policajac s Beverly Hillsa, serija Seinfeld), Beth komičarka J. Sweeney (It's Pat, TV šou Saturday Night Live), Brennana četrnaestogodišnji J. Pichler (Shiloh 2: Shiloh Season, The Fan), a Saru tri godine mlađa M. Gallo (Essenced Echoes, serija Sedmo nebo)

programme.title: Umorstva u Midsomeru
Midsomer murders
programme.desc: Golem kolut svjetski poznatog midsomerskog sira s plemenitom plijesni padne na ženu i ubije je. Otkriju se tajni i kontroverzni planovi za modernizaciju mljekare, a tračevi o privatnim životima roditelja izazovu svađu u uglednoj privatnoj srednjoj školi. Kad umre još ljudi povezanih s mljekarom, na vidjelo počnu izlaziti dobro čuvane tajne.

programme.title: Umirovljeni istrebljivači
Invasion Roswell
programme.desc: Kad napadnu izvanzemaljci, Zemlji je jedina nada tim za specijalne operacije koji je morao u mirovinu kad su ih smatrali prestarima za učinkovitost

programme.title: Liječnik na narudžbu
Royal Pains
programme.desc: Kad je zbog pogreške na receptu ugrožen život Erica Kassabiana, Hank krivi dr. Van Dykea. Paige daje Evanu vrlo zanimljivu ponudu

programme.title: Liječnik na narudžbu
Royal Pains
programme.desc: Hankovi problemi s povjerenjem u Divyju dolaze u prvi plan kad moraju surađivati kako bi otkrili uzrok bolesti rock grupe

programme.title: Dobra žena
Good wife
programme.desc: Pravnička serija koja prati teške odluke koje stoje pred Alicijom Florrick (Julianna Margulies) dok balansira između profesionalnog i osobnog života

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
Hawaii five-0
programme.desc: Trojica muškaraca bude se mamurni i u kadi svoje hotelske sobe pronalaze mrtvu ženu. Ničega se ne sjećaju, pa je na ekipi da otkrije što se dogodilo

programme.title: Djevojka iz Jerseyja
Jersey Girl
programme.desc: Mladi direktor Oliver Ollie Trinke (Ben Affleck) uspješan je PR u glazbenoj industriji. Kada se upozna i zaljubi u Gertrude Steiney (Jennifer Lopez), ona ubrzo zatrudni. Međutim, umre na porođaju i Ollie se iz New Yorka odluči vratiti u očev dom u New Jersey. Pod stresom zbog novonastale situacije, radišni Ollie izgubi posao i dospije na crnu listu. Tugujući za suprugom, obeća kćeri Gertie da će biti najbolji otac na svijetu. Sljedećih sedam godina provodi u nakani da vrati stari ugled. Jednoga dana upozna službenicu Mayu (Liv Tyler) s kojom se sprijatelji. Ona mu pomaže da prebrodi prošlost

programme.title: Kralj škorpiona 2: Uspon ratnika
The Scorpion King 2: Rise of a Warrior
programme.desc: Mathayus postaje prognani junak kad odbije dokazati slijepu odanost novom vođi Crnog škorpiona, Sargonu

programme.title: Carlitov način: Put do uspjeha
Carlito's way: rise to power
programme.desc: Put do moći je put prema dole. Carlito Brigante (Jay Hernandez), Earl (Mario Van Peebles) i Rocco (Michael Kelly) postaju najbolji prijatelji za vrijeme svog boravka u zatvoru. Nakon što su pušteni na slobodu, Rocco se upušta u trgovinu drogom s talijanskom mafijaškom obitelji koju predvodi Artie Bottolota Sr. (Burt Young), a Carlito u dogovore s Leroyjem "Hollywoodom Nickyjem" Barnesom (Sean Combs) oko teritorija na kojem će raspačavati drogu. Ubrzo trojica prijatelja postanu vrlo moćni. Kada se Earl odluči preseliti na Barbados sa svojom djevojkom i ostaviti se dilanja heroina, njegov mlađi brat se sukobi s mafijaškom obitelji pa Carlito i Rocco moraju riješiti problem kako bi spasili živote. „Carlitov način: Uspon do moći“ je nezahvalno uspoređivati s „Carlotovim načinom“ iz 1993. Braina De Palme jednostavno jer je ovaj potonji jedan od najboljih kriminalističkih filmova svih vremena. No bez obzira na tu činjenicu, „Carlitov način: Uspon do moći“ itekako se ima čime pohvaliti. Još jednom, na vrlo uvjerljiv način ćemo vidjeti kako izgleda i funkcionira svijet kriminala u kojem nema mjesta za slabiće ili pokajnike. U ulogama nerazdvojnih prijatelja upečatljivi su Jay Hernandez, Mario Van Peebles i Michael Kelly, dok je pravo iznenađenja filma poznati hip hoper P. Diddy u ulozi Hollywood Nickyja

programme.title: Dobra žena
Good wife
programme.desc: Pravnička serija koja prati teške odluke koje stoje pred Alicijom Florrick (Julianna Margulies) dok balansira između profesionalnog i osobnog života

programme.title: San za životom
Finding Neverland
programme.desc: Nakon što je Barriejeva (Johnny Depp) nova drama doživjela potpun neuspjeh, Barrie u šetnji parkom upozna četiri dječaka i njihovu majku, udovicu Sylviju (Kate Winslet). Sljedećih nekoliko mjeseci Barrie se svakodnevno igra s dječacima i dobije ideju za novu priču. U isto vrijeme produbljuje se njegovo prijateljstvo sa Sylvijom, zbog čega se ljuti njegova žena Mary (Radha Mitchell), s kojom provodi sve manje vremena. No Sylvijino zdravlje sve je lošije, Barrie se sve više veže uz dječake. Njegovo djelo Petar Pan uskoro doživi i svoju prvu izvedbu . Film je dobio Oscara za najbolju glazbu 2005. je nominira u još šest kategorija. Film je nominiran i u pet kategorija za Zlatni globus te osvojio tri nagrade Sierra i tri nagrade Young Artist(c)

programme.title: Žestoko
Slammed
programme.desc: We will go inside the insanely popular world of wrestling that's part sport and part entertainment, from the daily drama of promoters teetering on the edge of bankruptcy to performers risking permanent injury for a shot at fame and fortune. In this verité series, we'll be backstage as NWS's promoters plot how they'll keep their league afloat, scheduling shows and crafting storylines for their "characters" that will keep fans coming back. NOT RESEARCH APPROVED

programme.title: Posljedice
Aftermath
programme.desc: What would happen to the world if the population doubled overnight? How quickly would we run out of water? Power? Food? Mass migration would reshape counties. New high-rises soar would over the cities. But there are only so many resources to go around who will be left behind, as the planet struggles to deal with twice the population

programme.title: Posljedice
Aftermath
programme.desc: The earth has stopped spinning. We are no longer moving at 1000 miles per hour (1670 kilometers per hour) at the equator. Our days and nights are each 6 months long. Oceans part and flood northern and southern cities; most of those around the center of the globe are airless and lifeless. A lucky few human nomads discover the "last place on earth" where they can live year-round, a tiny ocean settlement where humanity ekes out the rest of its days on a non-spinning earth

programme.title: Yukonsko zlato
Yukon Gold
programme.desc: Klondike Gold Fever is a documentary series following a select group of remarkable family businesses in the Canadian north: Gold miners. These are not big drilling operations with corporate backing and a spot on the Toronto Stock Exchange. They are small, family-run placer mines that survive through grit, resourcefulness, hard won expertise and a deep knowledge and understanding of the land and its history. They have a few short months to earn their living for the entire year and are up against soaring operational costs, unreliable machinery, and Mother Nature. We'll follow these hard-working mining families from the first thaw in the spring, through months of long days and hard, dirty work, to the final freeze up in the fall. In the high stakes game of mining the search for gold is always a gamble and we'll watch as every one of these mining families plays its best hand

programme.title: Istrage zrakoplovnih nesreća
Air crash investigation
programme.desc: August 22nd, 1985 British Airtours Flight #28 is taking off from Manchester Airport for the Greek Island of Corfu. As the aircraft is accelerating, a loud thud emanates from the fuselage, and the pilots abandon takeoff. They believe a tire has blown, but passengers on the left side of the plane see the real problem one of the engines is on fire. Soon, thick black smoke fills the cabin, panicked passengers struggle to escape, and just minutes later, the aircraft is completely ravaged by fire. 55 people die. Can investigators determine how a minor emergency turned into one of the worst disasters in British aviation history

programme.title: Sekunde do katastrofe
Seconds from disaster
programme.desc: When a Boeing 747 crashes into a remote mountain-side 45 minutes after take off in 1985, investigators are left baffled. This is the deadliest single-aircraft accident in aviation history, with 520 passengers and crew left dead. Was the crash due to a bomb on board, or could something be flawed in the very structure of all 747s

programme.title: Istrage zrakoplovnih nesreća

programme.desc: Leading aviation experts are confronted with a shocking theory as they investigate one of the greatest aviation mysteries of all time

programme.title: Autocesta kroz pakao
Highway Thru Hell
programme.desc: A truck full of wine is sliced in half less than 24 hours after Jamie ships the Rotator to Alberta. Howie tackles this recovery all on his own

programme.title: Ludi znanstvenik
Mad Scientists
programme.desc: John teams up with Robert Baslee, an aeronautics genius who builds full-scale airplanes in his garage and flies them out of his backyard. Robert and John set out to transform one of Robert's planes to fly on pure electricity in just two days. Along with Bill (the battery guy) and Jim (the Human toolbox), they race against the clock to redesign the plane. After several props and a burned up motor, they have to fly off at sunset to get new materials. When the crowd arrives at dawn, they have yet to test their invention. And they will only get one chance. It's all or nothing at sunrise

programme.title: Ludi znanstvenik
Mad Scientists
programme.desc: John teams up with Tim Pickens, a real live rocket scientist with a suitcase rocket, a rocket bike, and a water rocket belt. Tim and John set out to build a water rocket belt strong enough to lift John out of a lake with just the parts they have in Tim's garage. With the help of three young apprentices, they design and build a light, more efficient rocket belt that they hook up to a jet ski. But can they get John all the way out of the water as a crowd of fighter pilot trainees cheer them on

programme.title: Iza kulisa
Inside
programme.desc: For eight years the Taliban and Al-Qaeda have bogged down US and NATO troops in Afghanistan-all the while seizing territory and creating chaos in nuclear-armed Pakistan

programme.title: Iza kulisa
Inside
programme.desc: This documentary will tell us: who the Muslim Brotherhood is, where they come from, what they want, how they are different from the other Muslim groups in Iraq and Afghanistan and where they're going. It will look at what sort of power and influence they will have in the coming months and what this means for Egypt and the rest of the world. And finally, it will look at how the Egyptian situation will affect the latest attempts at peace in Israel

programme.title: Nevjerojatan ljudski stroj
Incredible Human Machine
programme.desc: Take a high definition journey with National Geographic through a day in the life of the miraculous inner workings of the human body. From skin to bones to brains and everything in between, world-renowned athletes, rock stars, doctors and scientists guide us through the hows and whys of our daily lives. Steven Tyler's legendary vocal cords give us intimate insight into how we produce sound. An Olympic weightlifter's power, gymnast's grace, and pentathlete's endurance highlight how we can propel ourselves forward and up with astonishing agility and speed. The U.S. Navy's Blue Angels prove the essential link between our blood and our brain. Patients who have lost and regained vision and motion provide living testimonies to the remarkable resilience and regenerative abilities of the human body. Through 10,000 blinks of an eye, 20,000 breaths of air, 100,000 beats of the heart, see how stunning, surprising, and incredible a day in the life of a human really is

programme.title: Iza kulisa

programme.title: Seoba životinja
Animal Mega Moves
programme.desc: A team of British vets and transport engineers attempt to move fifteen racehorses worth a total of $4 million over 10,000 kilometers from England to Hong Kong in a specially adapted Boeing 747 aircraft. We follow the horses being transported to Britain's 3rd busiest airport, Stansted, where they are loaded into special stalls and transferred into the cargo plane. The stalls are secured to the aircrafts fuselage to ensure they remain stable if the horses become agitated during the flight. During the 12-hour flight, a team of vets on-board monitors the horses to ensure they eat enough food and avoid dehydration

programme.title: Pripreme za Sudnji dan
Doomsday Preppers
programme.desc: We profile two unique individuals who fear the end of the world is fast approaching. First we meet Chad, a man who fears a nuclear strike from his own government. With his family in tow, Chad executes the biggest prep of his life - a 140' escape tunnel. Then we head to North Carolina where Mike Evock and his family are prepping for a devastating biological and chemical attack. Ex-special forces, Mike runs an ATV park, but out back, he has prepped it as the perfect bug-out spot. With an assault rifle fitted ATV, and a mobile chemical attack tent, Mike has a response time that most preppers would envy

Science of Stupid
programme.desc: The Science of Stupid is the show that combines cold hard science with some of the craziest, most spectacular and painful user generated clips ever recorded. In this episode Richard Hammond explores the many ways to embarrass, injure and humiliate yourself when walking on ice, riding in shopping trolleys or simply underestimating electrical currents

programme.title: Posljedice
Aftermath
programme.desc: Our sun is aging. Like all of us on Earth, every day it's getting older. As it ages, it actually grows increasingly hotter. The sun will use up more and more of its fuel, and the temperature on earth will rise. . Here is a world we'll never see. A world where that natural aging process is sped up, so it takes place on a human scale. How long could our world -- and all of the things we've built -- survive a rapidly aging sun? Take a look into a terrifying future -- where our planet is eventually swallowed by the sun

programme.title: Najsmrtonosnije životinje svijeta
World's deadliest animals
programme.desc: The steamy jungles of the Amazon region reverberate with the sound of screeches, growls and grunts. These are the noises of creatures hidden in the trees vying with one another for survival in the forest. 1.Eyelash viper - So called because of the enlarged scales above its eyes, the eyelash viper hangs in the trees

programme.title: Iza kulisa
Inside
programme.desc: For eight years the Taliban and Al-Qaeda have bogged down US and NATO troops in Afghanistan-all the while seizing territory and creating chaos in nuclear-armed Pakistan

programme.title: Iza kulisa
Inside
programme.desc: This documentary will tell us: who the Muslim Brotherhood is, where they come from, what they want, how they are different from the other Muslim groups in Iraq and Afghanistan and where they're going. It will look at what sort of power and influence they will have in the coming months and what this means for Egypt and the rest of the world. And finally, it will look at how the Egyptian situation will affect the latest attempts at peace in Israel

programme.title: Pripreme za Sudnji dan
Doomsday Preppers
programme.desc: We profile two unique individuals who fear the end of the world is fast approaching. First we meet Chad, a man who fears a nuclear strike from his own government. With his family in tow, Chad executes the biggest prep of his life - a 140' escape tunnel. Then we head to North Carolina where Mike Evock and his family are prepping for a devastating biological and chemical attack. Ex-special forces, Mike runs an ATV park, but out back, he has prepped it as the perfect bug-out spot. With an assault rifle fitted ATV, and a mobile chemical attack tent, Mike has a response time that most preppers would envy

programme.title: Svjetlost na kraju svijeta
Light At The Edge of The World
programme.desc: Wade Davis makes a remarkable journey into the heart of war-torn Colombia to visit one of the indigenous groups who call themselves the Elder Brother. These extraordinary people claim to be the last descendents of a once great civilization, the Tairona, and to speak with their voice. Could they really be the last window we have on the great high civilizations of the ancient Americas? Wade's journey to find out takes him from the tropical plains of Northern Colombia to the frozen peaks of the Sierra Nevada de Santa Marta and a chilling close encounter with the FARC. It also takes him into the heart of one of the most unique indigenous cultures anywhere in the world

programme.title: Najsmrtonosnije životinje svijeta
World's deadliest animals
programme.desc: The steamy jungles of the Amazon region reverberate with the sound of screeches, growls and grunts. These are the noises of creatures hidden in the trees vying with one another for survival in the forest. 1.Eyelash viper - So called because of the enlarged scales above its eyes, the eyelash viper hangs in the trees

World's deadliest animals

These are the noises of creatures hidden in the trees vying with one another for survival in the forest. 1.Eyelash viper - So called because of the enlarged scales above its eyes, the eyelash viper hangs in the trees

programme.title: Pripreme za Sudnji dan
Doomsday Preppers
programme.desc: Deep in Oregon's back-country sits an 80 acre off-the-grid estate that prepper Curt and his family have designed as a fortress in the event of an economic collapse. Isolation is one of their greatest strengths but the protective measures are endless: a 3,000 square foot greenhouse, a lake with one million gallons of water, infrared cameras and high tech software system - not to mention the children are trained in marksmanship. Now, Curt is working on his next prep - turning a regular truck into a high-speed armored. But while the cameras are rolling, Mother Nature strikes and the entire property is under an immediate threat. In Alaska, Rodney is preparing for a cataclysmic earthquake and the towering tsunami that could follow. With military training, an extensive food supply and an extreme bugout vehicle named "War Machine", Rodney is confident he's on the right track to surviving Doomsday. He's even devised a unique underwater cache system to sustain his family in a resource-scarce community - but concerned the public will be unable to refill scuba tanks after a disaster, Rodney devises a tankless scuba system

programme.title: Neukroćena Amerika
Untamed Americas
programme.desc: Stunning HD cinematography brings us on an epic yet intimate journey through America's Coasts... among the most diverse and dramatic shores on earth. Shaped by three great oceans, America's coastline twists well over 100,000 miles almost from POLE to POLE… the only contiguous landmass to encompass nearly every latitude. We travel from the cold, deep Pacific, to the idyllic warm paradise of the Caribbean sea… from the icy waters of the Arctic, to the southern ocean at the end of the world. America's shores are home to extraordinary life… and awe-inspiring spectacles that could only be found here

programme.title: Nordijska divljina
Nordic Wild
programme.desc: In the remote north of Scandinavia lies a vast treeless wilderness, the Arctic tundra. For much of the year the temperature rarely rises above freezing. But surprisingly there is life here battling against the elements

programme.title: Znanost budućnosti Stephena Hawkinga
Stephen Hawking's Science of The Future
programme.desc: The barriers between the physical and virtual worlds begin to blur as Stephen Hawking and his team of scientists explore the latest innovations

programme.title: Svjetlost na kraju svijeta
Light At The Edge of The World
programme.desc: Wade Davis travels to Mongolia to meet today's members of the ancient nomadic horse cultures who have thrived in the harsh conditions of the Central Asian Steppes for more than two thousand years. Wade's mission is to discover how this ancient culture has made it into the twenty-first Century and to search for the keys to one of man's oldest and deepest bonds - the bond between man and horse. He arrives in central Mongolia at the start of the great Mongolian summer festival, the Naadam, and follows the fortunes of two of the top local horse trainers. One of them seems destined to win everything, but a bitter twist of fate awaits him, as Wade discovers the secrets of the man-horse bond by taking part in the lives of his nomadic horsemen hosts

programme.title: Najsmrtonosnije životinje svijeta
World's deadliest animals
programme.desc: National Geographic Channel's hit series returns with a new episode featuring twelve of the deadliest creatures hiding in the forest. They hunt in the dense underbrush, high in the forest canopy and emerge from underground to do battle on the forest floor. Each one of these animals is equipped with unique adaptations for survival - including deadly weaponry and cunning strategies. But the forest is more than a backdrop in the brutal struggle for survival. Often it plays a key role. Its foliage offers camouflage for stealth attacks, its trees provide a platform from which powerful carnivores launch their assaults and its rich food resources attract plenty of prey. The forest is a complex environment, shaping the lives of every creature in it

programme.title: Kraljevi koji nestaju
programme.desc: The story of 5 young lions that must conquer the Namib desert and establish their own kingdom in this place of constant danger, everlasting hunger and thirst, and inevitable suffering

programme.title: Životinjski klub boraca 3
programme.desc: This episode reveals the secret tactics of the Animal Kingdom's most ferocious feline fighters, and brings you closer than ever before to adrenaline-packed fights from Africa, the Americas and beyond. From the big to the small, the fearsome to the furry, the world's most crazy cat contenders make for an adrenaline-fueled Animal Fight Club

programme.title: Divlja Indonezija
programme.desc: Borneo is the worlds third largest island, and Sumatra is no dwarf in comparison. Both islands became cut off from the Asian mainland when sea levels rose at the end of the last ice age 12,000 years ago. Large animals became marooned, isolated from their mainland cousins. Over time, they have adapted and evolved to their new home developing an array of unique traits on each island. Today, these are the Islands of Monsters

programme.title: Divlja Kolumbija
programme.desc: Spanning the western length of Colombia, the Chocó region is rich with biodiversity. It is the wettest place on earth and the only country in South America to be bathed by both the Pacific and Atlantic oceans. The rainforests, isolated by the Andes, host a habitat of unique, endemic and yet-to-be discovered species

programme.title: Divlja Kanada
programme.desc: From the prairies to Canada's vast boreal forest that stretches almost from coast to coast, we reveal a huge wilderness of extremes that has been shaped over millennia by both humans and wildfires. Here pronghorn antelope, the fastest hoofed land animal on earth, still haunt the grasslands, the elusive wolverine thrives in the icy remote northern forests and beaver share their cozy lodges with grateful muskrats

programme.title: Divlja Šri Lanka
programme.desc: Sri Lanka as a country contains astonishing biodiversity. But one environment on the island is a biodiversity hotspot - even richer and more complex than anywhere else. Many species unique to Sri Lanka live nowhere except its central highlands - in the cloud forests. It's a fast-vanishing habitat. The cool, high, damp conditions are perfect for growing tea

programme.title: Tajne divljine
programme.desc: Dense forests, vast tracts of mountains and rugged terrain these are the earths remote, isolated wild places. Life here is hard and recording it just as challenging. Finding and then getting close to the few, wary creatures of these special worlds has taken decades

programme.title: Alfa psi
programme.desc: Vohne Liche Kennels is a K-9 training facility for specialized police and military service dogs. This week the pressure is on Bobby to make sure the Special Forces troops are ready to graduate from Vohne Liches dog handling program. Meanwhile, Kenny and the guys are away conducting police training as well as honoring a fallen officer. Kenny challenges KC to learn rappelling, and before the end of the day one of them ends up in the hospital

programme.title: Alfa psi
programme.desc: At Vohne Liche, a new group of soldiers are paired up with their dogs and taught to detect bombs under an "explosive scenario." Kenny gets concerned when one dog shows signs of post-traumatic stress. Meanwhile, KC causes his own flare-ups, when he shows up late and gets into an altercation with a client

programme.title: Najveći svjetski ubojice
programme.desc: The disputed borders between land and water come in many different forms-beaches, riverbanks, swamps and frozen ice. Each is home to its own dramas and conflicts, as aquatic and terrestrial creatures meet and engage in combat. Predators learn to hunt in different elements, and prey must watch for attacks from every direction

programme.title: Najveći svjetski ubojice
programme.desc: In the animal kingdom a covert assassin emerged. Lurking in the shadows, ready to pounce at lighting speeds, he searches for his next meal. He fights for survival, battling his foes. He is an animal ninja and possesses the skills to kill: speed, stealth, agility, patience and weapons. In the next hour, the world’s deadliest animals will use their jaw dropping talents to fight to live another day. From stealthy cats to patient seals, giant centipedes to kick-boxing kangaroos, these animals will amaze us all on World’s Deadliest: Animal Ninja Warriors(c)

programme.title: Pecanje čudovišta
programme.desc: Zeb is in search of a fish with a terrifying reputation. Wolf fish, known locally as haimara, can reach one-meter in length, weigh as much as 88 pounds and are a species said to be a brutal hunter-of animals and reportedly even humans

programme.title: Najveći svjetski ubojice
programme.desc: This episode welcomes viewers to the deadly world of the most armed and dangerous gangsters, assassins, and con artists of the animal kingdom. A gang of flesh-eating fish take down a river rat; the Bengal tiger shows just how to get the job done—alone; ta red-back spider lures, then eats her date; a femme fatale like no other, mama brown bear goes head to head with another bear to protect her young; and a pack of killer whales demonstrate how they live up to their name

programme.title: Najveći svjetski ubojice
programme.desc: Golden sands, warm crystal-clear water, palm trees… it sounds like heaven, but there can be a dark side to paradise. Living in the world’s most idyllic places is no holiday for many animals—this is fiercely contested real estate, and the hunting grounds of some truly terrifying and deadly creatures. The world’s most exotic destinations can be a Predator Paradise

programme.title: Najveći svjetski ubojice
programme.desc: Some baby predators must learn hunting from their parents, while others are deadly from the first day they are born. And some deceive their prey or manipulate their brains. In a world where only the strong survive, these babies come out swinging

programme.title: Najveći svjetski ubojice
programme.desc: The disputed borders between land and water come in many different forms-beaches, riverbanks, swamps and frozen ice. Each is home to its own dramas and conflicts, as aquatic and terrestrial creatures meet and engage in combat. Predators learn to hunt in different elements, and prey must watch for attacks from every direction

programme.title: Najveći svjetski ubojice
programme.desc: Our planet's mightiest predators don't always get their own way-the tables can be turned on these mighty hunters when the underdog fights back. An enormous Nile crocodile learns a harsh lesson that hippos aren't to be messed with, and a lion-the so-called "King of the Jungle"-pays dearly after messing with a buffalo. A shark is dispatched by a giant octopus, while a gazelle teaches a cheetah a painful lesson

programme.title: Najveći svjetski ubojice
programme.desc: This episode welcomes viewers to the deadly world of the most armed and dangerous gangsters, assassins, and con artists of the animal kingdom. A gang of flesh-eating fish take down a river rat; the Bengal tiger shows just how to get the job done—alone; ta red-back spider lures, then eats her date; a femme fatale like no other, mama brown bear goes head to head with another bear to protect her young; and a pack of killer whales demonstrate how they live up to their name

programme.title: Najveći svjetski ubojice

The world’s most exotic destinations can be a Predator Paradise

programme.title: Najveći svjetski ubojice
programme.desc: In the animal kingdom a covert assassin emerged. Lurking in the shadows, ready to pounce at lighting speeds, he searches for his next meal. He fights for survival, battling his foes. He is an animal ninja and possesses the skills to kill: speed, stealth, agility, patience and weapons. In the next hour, the world’s deadliest animals will use their jaw dropping talents to fight to live another day. From stealthy cats to patient seals, giant centipedes to kick-boxing kangaroos, these animals will amaze us all on World’s Deadliest: Animal Ninja Warriors

programme.title: Najveći svjetski ubojice
programme.desc: This episode welcomes viewers to the deadly world of the most feudal families, almighty monarchs, territorial clans, and awesome armies of the animal kingdom. Holding the crown for the largest land carnivore in the world, polar bears feast like kings, eating all the seals they can. Giraffes go head to head in epic neck jousting battles over lady giraffes; sand-tiger sharks—wage wars in utero; and wildebeest warriors get the upper hand—or hoof—in one of the greatest wildlife migrations on earth. Watch how these creatures and the rest of our species duke it out in the World’s Deadliest: Game of Thrones

programme.title: Najveći svjetski ubojice
programme.desc: In science fiction, lethal morphing Transformers may be a figment of the imagination, but here on Earth, beware, transformers are for real! Whether it’s to hunt or protect itself against predators, they’re spine-chilling killing machines ready to mutate in surprising and amazing ways. Some of the world’s deadliest animals use their talents to transform in astonishing ways. From colour changing to shape shifting, getting fierce, turning up the heat, fooling their prey or simply letting it fly, these animals do anything it takes to survive on World’s Deadliest: Transformers

programme.title: Ubojice s obale jezera
programme.desc: Deep within Africa's heart lies the Zambezi Valley. At the center of this wilderness lies a great lake, an Eden like nowhere else on earth. Here we meet three males lions; Takunda, Gombwe and Zindoga. They are coming into their prime, but still have much to prove

programme.title: Tigar u bijegu
programme.desc: "Tiger on the Run" is a natural history documentary following a young tiger in India, that's been forced out of his home territory by another male, and has to struggle for survival. The film promises to address the issue of habitat destruction and interaction of tigers and humans caused by the shrinking habitat

programme.title: Orlovi
programme.desc: Eagles are top predators, who battle fiercely for survival and work hard to raise their young. To explore the world of the eagle we follow one individual from hatching to leaving the nest and setting up a home

programme.title: Ubojice s obale jezera

programme.title: Najsmrtonosnije životinje u Africi
programme.desc: Predators specialize in different strategies of killing technique. From silent, unseen ambushers, to immense power, stealth and camouflage, these creatures are at the top of their game. Equipped with super-senses, cunning strategies, lightning-fast reactions and remarkable physiological adaptations that have been perfected over millennia, their prey don't stand a chance

programme.title: Ubojice s obale jezera
programme.desc: Deep within Africa's heart lies the Zambezi Valley. At the center of this wilderness lies a great lake, an Eden like nowhere else on earth. Here we meet three males lions; Takunda, Gombwe and Zindoga. They are coming into their prime, but still have much to prove

programme.title: Alfa psi
programme.desc: K9s4Cops, a charitable organization that buys canines for police departments who cant afford them, stops by Vohne Liche Kennels with a client looking for a new dog. When the guys discover this dog must be able to work in the water, its up to Bobby and Luther to get the dog ready, or VLK may lose all of K9s4Cops future business. Meanwhile, Kenny, Danny and KC work with Charlie Fourkiller, a Kokomo Police Officer training to be a dog handler. Kenny is pleased with Charlies progress during bite training, and invites him to come along on a drug bust to gain some real-life experience

programme.title: Alfa psi
programme.desc: Kenny is interested in growing an Executive Protection branch at VLK to supply dogs for celebrities, athletes, and other high-end clients. He thinks he has found the right guy for the job in Wade Morrel, but Wades arrogant attitude could come back to bite him literally. Meanwhile, Kenny gets a list of 28 dogs that his trainers claim need to be returned to Europe

programme.title: Najveći svjetski ubojice
programme.desc: There are some places on this planet that are so wild that if you go there...you may not come out ALIVE

programme.title: Tajanstveni majmuni Shangri-La
programme.desc: Representing the meticulous and ambitious work of an all-Chinese film company led by award-winning filmmaker, Xi Zhinong, this spectacular film is the true story of a family of Yunnan snub-nosed monkeys living in the highest forests in the world. Only recently discovered, snub-nosed monkeys are hauntingly beautiful primates, different and gentler than others of their kind. Elfin-like, they seem both childlike and wise beyond their years

programme.title: Pecanje čudovišta
programme.desc: Deep in the rainforest of Nicaragua, Zeb Hogan is on a mission to track down a powerful predator- the giant tarpon. Tarpon are usually found in the sea, but there are stories of 300-pound giants lurking here - in the largest lake in Central America - and a secluded jungle river that could hold the biggest monster of them all

programme.title: Divlja Rusija
programme.desc: Synonymous with punishing cold, parts of Siberia bake at 40 degrees Celsius. Lurking in the forests of Siberia's Yakutia region with a face like a kangaroo and vampire's teeth is the musk deer

programme.title: Ubojice s obale jezera
programme.desc: Deep within Africa's heart lies the Zambezi Valley. At the center of this wilderness lies a great lake, an Eden like nowhere else on earth. Here we meet three males lions; Takunda, Gombwe and Zindoga. They are coming into their prime, but still have much to prove

The film promises to address the issue of habitat destruction and interaction of tigers and humans caused by the shrinking habitat

programme.title: Najubojitija svjetska trojka
programme.desc: These are the predators that prove that when it comes to hunting prey, size doesn’t always matter. These are the World's Deadliest: Little Killers miniscule menaces with the ability to take down prey several times their own size

programme.title: Najveći svjetski ubojice
programme.desc: There are some places on this planet that are so wild that if you go there...you may not come out ALIVE

programme.title: Tajne kraljevske kobre
programme.desc: COBRA is an unprecedented journey into the natural history of the wild King Cobra-following them into their world-revealing what they do, where they go, and who they interact with-when we are not around. And surprisingly, the people of India are very much a part of the story. Early evidence suggests that kings might be more intertwined with humans than previously thought., making this project more important than ever.1 It's a close and personal look into the secret life of the King-and the best chance we have of ensuring the survival of this legendary snake

programme.title: Ubojice s obale jezera

programme.title: Tajanstveni majmuni Shangri-La
programme.desc: Representing the meticulous and ambitious work of an all-Chinese film company led by award-winning filmmaker, Xi Zhinong, this spectacular film is the true story of a family of Yunnan snub-nosed monkeys living in the highest forests in the world. Only recently discovered, snub-nosed monkeys are hauntingly beautiful primates, different and gentler than others of their kind. Elfin-like, they seem both childlike and wise beyond their years

programme.title: Pecanje čudovišta
programme.desc: There are fish, …and then there are FISH. Lurking in the murky depths of the world's great waterways are bizarre giants-specimens of such enormous proportion and odd appearance they boggle the mind. In his quest to save the world's big fish, aquatic ecologist Zeb Hogan has wrangled some of the biggest freshwater fish in the world. In this episode, we follow him as he goes in search of one of North America's toothiest and most misunderstood monster fish: the alligator gar. These bizarre creatures reach lengths of 10 feet and have a mouthful of razor-sharp teeth. They've disappeared from their former northern ranges, and are now disappearing from the bayous and marshes of the southern United States. They're under assault because of their fearsome appearance, rumors of attacks on humans, and the belief by some anglers who believe they devour game fish. We join Zeb Hogan as he comes face to face with an alligator gar and discovers if the myths about this monster are true

programme.title: Najsmrtonosnije životinje svijeta
programme.desc: North America is home to an array of wild creatures…creatures that have roamed the continent for millennia. Among this myriad of species is an elite group of twelve --an assembly of animals, insects, and arachnids-- equipped with an arsenal of predator skills. Now, witness their magnificence by journeying into their inner sanctums. From the painted deserts to the coastal waterways, to the dense forests, to our own back yards…they creep, crawl, and live where we live, work, and play. The shows climax comes when we reach the animal whose size, strength or fearsome reputation looms above all others. For this superlative denizen of the natural world, we not only go in depth to examine the magnificent adaptations that have allowed it to survive and thrive, but we also hear from someone whos met it first hand, and lived to tell the story. Theyre beautiful, theyre highly evolved, and theyre dangerousthey are North Americas Deadly Dozen

programme.title: Timbavati: Lavlji ep
programme.desc: Some of Africa's most formidable predators live in family groups. We follow the lives of three of these - lion, wild dog and hyena - as they cross paths in Timbavati, near Kruger. The Timbavati pride is a newly formed coalition of three lion brothers, three lionesses and their newborn cubs. In comparison, the Sohebeles have lost their father and their territory. The 5 youngsters are left to their own devices. We compare the structure of the lions' family group to a pack of wild dogs that visit the Timbavati, and the local hyena clan, lead by a powerful matriarch. All three families work in very different ways with one purpose- survival

programme.title: Najsmrtonosnije životinje u Africi
programme.desc: Lions get most of the attention but there are many cats that kill. Their size, camouflage and hunting strategy may vary but they're all deadly. You’d think there is nothing more exciting than watching a pride of lions moving in for the kill but there are others just as fascinating, agile and dangerous. In the quiet of the night no prey will hear them coming

programme.title: Tajne kraljevske kobre
programme.desc: COBRA is an unprecedented journey into the natural history of the wild King Cobra-following them into their world-revealing what they do, where they go, and who they interact with-when we are not around. And surprisingly, the people of India are very much a part of the story. Early evidence suggests that kings might be more intertwined with humans than previously thought., making this project more important than ever.1 It's a close and personal look into the secret life of the King-and the best chance we have of ensuring the survival of this legendary snake

programme.title: Ukleta povijest
programme.desc: Jezoviti osvrt na hotel kojeg je u 19. stoljeću sagradio serijski ubojica HH Holmes. Zdanje je sagrađeno zbog ubijanja, a u njemu su bile plinske komore i skladišta kiseline pomoću kojih je ubio čak 200 ljudi

programme.title: Kronike odmetnika: "Hells Angels"
Kronike odmetnika: Hells Angels
programme.desc: Christie otkriva kako je Sonny Barger došao na čelo, proširio njihovo carstvo i pretvorio ih u skupinu odmetnika koja je sijala strah diljem svijeta. Christie također iznosi kako su Bargerovi postupci ugrozili dominaciju "Hells Angelsa"

programme.title: Leepu i Pitbull
programme.desc: Dečki preuzimaju prvi kamionet, "Chevy S10" u iznimno lošem stanju. Leepu kamionet promatra kao prazno platno i ima velike planove da ga posve preinači

programme.title: Oživljavanje starih auta
programme.desc: Legendarni roker George Lynch iz grupe "Dokken" svratio je u radionicu "Buickom Rivierom" iz 1965. te daje Dannyju odriješene ruke da ga uredi u stilu "Grofove" radionice. Hoće li Danny usrećiti čovjeka koji obožava aute jednako kao glazbu

programme.title: Oživljavanje starih auta
programme.desc: Klijent želi dotjerati svoj "Harley Davidson Road Glide" iz 2004. godine, ali Shannon i Ryan nisu sigurni da će uspjeti. Drugi skupljač svratio je u radionicu da Dannyju pokaže "Lincoln Mark III" iz 1970. godine. Danny jedva čeka da ga isproba

programme.title: Lovci na kamione
programme.desc: S parkirališta su ukrali kamion pun alkohola u vrijednosti od 120.000 dolara te počinje utrka za nagradu od 3300 dolara. Tko će prvi pronaći kamion? Big T. i Bek moraju skrenuti s puta jer im je zbog divljanja na cesti vozač poslao poruku upomoć

programme.title: Lovci na kamione
programme.desc: Iz sjedišta "Platinum Truckinga" ukrali su dva kamiona s energetskim napitcima vrijednim 45.000 dolara. Čini se da je umiješan netko iznutra. Tri ekipe ulaze u otvorenu borbu: nagrada za svaki kamion iznosi 5000 dolara, što je pozamašna svota

programme.title: Ljudi iz močvare
programme.desc: Misteriozne sile spustile su se nad močvaru i ispituju krajnje granice lovaca. Jedan lovac ugrožava život jer je zašao na ukleto područje

programme.title: Američke restauracije
programme.desc: Nakon što im je Rickov omiljeni klijent Big Mike u košari donio "Ducatijev" motocikl iz 1964. godine, kreću u potragu za rijetkim dijelovima. Mogu li dečki složiti motocikl ili će se zbog pritiska i oni raspasti u komadiće

programme.title: Američke restauracije
programme.desc: Kad natpis "Carl'sa Jr.-a", lanca brze hrane, u obliku zvijezde iz 1970-ih stigne na obnovu, Rick i ekipa žele obaviti nevjerojatan posao. Hoće li im se zvijezde posložiti ili će Ricka zaboljeti želudac

programme.title: Borci s morskim psima
programme.desc: Ekipa se nađe oči u oči s velikim bijelim psinama dugačkim 4,5 metra u zaljevu False. Divovske bijele psine razaraju palubu i dovode ekipu do ruba

programme.title: Drvosječe
programme.desc: Serija "Drvosječe" na pola je sezone, a pritisak da što bolje okončaju sezonu veći je nego ikad. Na Pacifičkom sjeverozapadu ekipa "Rygaard Logging" počela je upisivati sve veći broj klada zahvaljujući DJ-u Jeremiahu, ali danas… Nije se pojavio

programme.title: Dinastija patki
programme.desc: Willie otkriva da njegova kći Sadie ima novog dečka. Dok dogovara kako da ga upozna, smišlja plan kako da ga drži na uzici(c)

programme.title: Ljudi iz močvare
programme.desc: Močvarnjaci se bore protiv golemih aligatora i Majke Prirode jer žele osvojiti "Blago u rukavcu". Jedan je lovac zašao duboko u močvaru kako bi uhvatio legendarnog gmaza

programme.title: Cjenkanje na obalni način
programme.desc: Da bi izbjegao pravne zavrzlame, Tony mora istovariti robu iz jednog od svojih brojnih vozila, ali ne može odbiti posao da bi kupio novo. Hoće li nastradati ili će steći prednost

programme.title: U potrazi za Hitlerom
programme.desc: Godine 2014. FBI je objavio mogućnost da je Hitler pobjegao u Južnu Ameriku. Uz povjerljive podatke koji otkrivaju nove tragove, u emisiji "U potrazi za Hitlerom" pokušavaju riješiti zagonetku o smrti najvećeg zločinca svih vremena

programme.title: Lovci na zlato: Legenda "planine praznovjerja"
Gold Hunters: Legend Of The Superstition Mountains
programme.desc: Wayne i ekipa nikad nisu bili bliže nagradi od 200 milijuna dolara pa kreću u srce tame gdje ih zagonetno otkriće dovodi do još veće tajne

programme.title: Prokletstvo Oak Islanda
programme.desc: U emisiji "Prokletstvo Oak Islanda" braća Rick i Marty Lagina proširuju potragu za dosad nedostižnim blagom koje je obavijeno 200-godišnjim velom tajne

programme.title: Lovci na kamione

programme.title: Bitka za skladište
Storage Wars
programme.desc: Nova dražba održava se u Riversideu, gdje će Jarroda i Brandi dočekati mnoštvo novih, ali izrazito nestrpljivih konkurenata. Dok se oni natječu za skladište puno klasičnih, kućanskih predmeta, Barry kupuje 'tajanstveni prtljažnik'. Darrell pronalazi kutiju punu zanimljivih knjiga koje, ako su vrijedne, mogu podebljati njegov bankovni račun za pozamašan iznos
programme.category: dokumentarni reality, Young with a Gun

programme.title: Špediterski ratovi
programme.desc: Nakon što je na glazbenom festivalu osvojio disko robota koji riga vatru, Chrisa Kikelhana ubrzo obuzme nostalgija za danima kad je imao lakše zadatke. Dusty je na svojoj koži iskusio kako se ponaša plemstvo kad mu dođe klijent s neobičnim zahtjevom

programme.title: Zvijezde zalagaonice
Pawn stars
programme.desc: U pokušaju da dokaže kako bi trebao imati vlasničkog udjela u zalagaonici, Corey kupuje mač, a da pri tome ne traži i drugo mišljenje

programme.title: Zvijezde zalagaonice
Pawn stars
programme.desc: U zalagaonicu stiže stablo s revolverom iz 1800-ih godina. Chumlee postaje kreativan kad ugleda renesansnu grafiku Pietra Facchettija, dok Stari inzistira da zalagaonica ponudi popust na Dan umirovljenika

programme.title: Zvijezde zalagaonice
Pawn stars
programme.desc: U zalagaonicu stiže dres s potpisom D. Foutsa iz "San Diego Chargersa". Rick pokušava svladati tajne zanata kad stigne mađioničarski kavez za ptice H. Blackstonea. Corey i Chumlee nagovaraju Ricka da se pridruži njihovoj ligi am. nogometa iz mašte

programme.title: Zvijezde zalagaonice
Pawn stars
programme.desc: U zalagaonicu stižu čahure iz posljednje pljačke J. Dillingera. Rick i Corey žele sklopiti dobar posao u pregovorima oko "Schwinna Whizzera" iz 1947. Chumlee iznova proživljava uspomene iz djetinjstva kad klijent donese lutku "Stretch Armstrong"

programme.title: Australske zvijezde zalagaonice

programme.title: Australske zvijezde zalagaonice

programme.title: Napoleon - pohod na Rusiju
Napoleon: The Campaign of Russia
programme.desc: Napoleon je izgubio polovicu svojih trupa prije dolaska u Moskvu. Konačni neuspjeh bio je prelazak Berezine gdje se ostatak njegove vojske utopio, a on je pobjegao i ostavio svoje ljude. Godine 1812. Napoleon je okupio vojsku od 600 000 vojnika, pripadnika 24 različita naroda, najveću vojsku ikad stvorenu. Protivno savjetima svojih najbližih savjetnika, maršira prema Moskvi odlučan u namjeri da pokori Rusiju. 172 dana poslije, Napoleon se povlači i iza sebe ostavlja 400 000 svojih vojnika, mrtvih ili zarobljenih. Ova dokumentarna drama prikazuje ovu najznamenitiju i najlegendarniju vojnu kampanju. Također pokušava otkriti zašto je Napoleon odlučio osvojiti Rusiju, kako je najveći vođa tog vremena mogao počiniti toliko strateških pogrešaka i kako su ga doživljavali Rusi, drugi europski vladari i njegove vlastite trupe

programme.title: Čovjek i divljina
Where the Wild Men are
programme.desc: Ben putuje u Indiju na Himalaju u posjet bivšem vojnom pilotu, 69-godišnjem Steveu Lallu. Steve je život u visokom društvu zamijenio za jednostavan život na farmi u planinama

programme.title: Život u doba naftne groznice
Boomtowners
programme.desc: Istražujemo kontroverznu metodu frakturiranja. Haley i Larysa doznaju da im nisu odobrili kredit za prijevozničku tvrtku. Hoće li im to pokvariti planove? (S1, Ep2)

programme.title: Tragači za blagom
Prospectors
programme.desc: Gromobran. Dorrisi ponovno dižu u zrak svoje slavno nalazište amazonita. Cardwelli doživljavaju strašno iskustvo bojeći se za goli život. Homer se oprašta od Dwaynea. (S3, Ep6)

programme.title: Kraljevi drva
Timber Kings
programme.desc: Joel se u Kaliforniji bori s prekratkim rokom. Beat organizira ekipu kako bi dovršili golemi projekt koji samo što nisu poslali. (S2, Ep5)

programme.title: Najubojitiji ratnik
Deadliest Warrior
programme.desc: Dolazi do sudara svjetova kada se centurion, zapovjednik rimske vojske koja gazi sve pred sobom, sukobi s Rajputom, najvećim indijskim borcem

programme.title: Nevjerojatni g. Goodwin
Incredible Mr. Goodwin
programme.desc: Jonathan se u kalifornijskoj pustinji upušta u poznatu vratolomiju koja ni Harryju Houdiniju triput nije pošla za rukom. Uz helikopter i cirkuski trapez skidanje lisica postaje vrlo opasan zadatak

programme.title: Engineered
programme.desc: Marshall Brain istražuje kako nam je spužva omogućila najbolju stvar od narezanoga kruga? Također istražuje koji dio magneta dovodi rock and roll masama

programme.title: Kolosalne selidbe
Massive Moves
programme.desc: Obitelj iz Saskatchewana angažira tim vozača kamiona na ledu da transportiraju njihovu drvenu trokatnicu preko zamrznutog jezera. (S1, Ep1)

programme.title: Obalna straža Aljaske
Coast Guard Alaska
programme.desc: Obalna straža sprema se za spašavanje kajakaša zarobljenih u ledu, muškarca s nekoliko slomljenih rebara i posade ribarice u velikim problemima

programme.title: Radionica Graveyard Carz
Graveyard Carz
programme.desc: Pivo za van. Charger je u pogonu i ekipa se žuri dovršiti taj auto, unatoč naizgled beskrajnom nizu smetnji sa svih strana. Josh se trudi postati organiziraniji. (S2, Ep9)

Jade Fever

WWII Air Crash Detectives

programme.title: Tragači za blagom
Prospectors
programme.desc: Amanda nalazi akvamarin na opasnome mjestu. Steve i Rich suočavaju se s nezvanim gostima na svojoj parceli, a obitelj Dorris nalazi nešto veličanstveno. (S2, Ep2)

programme.title: Kraljevi drva
Timber Kings
programme.desc: Idealna lokacija, brdo s pogledom na dvorac Edinburgh. Joel je ovu kuću sagradio po uzoru na vlastitu kuću kojom su se klijenti oduševili

programme.title: Kraljevi drva
Timber Kings
programme.desc: Peter u Preriesu zaglavi u blatu pokušavajući ispuniti naručiteljev san, a Joel pomiče granice kako bi sagradio svinjac za vrlo zahtjevne naručitelje - svoju djecu. (S2, Ep6)

programme.title: Kraljevi rezbarenja

programme.title: Prijevoz brvnara
Cabin Truckers
programme.desc: Wade je dobio ponudu za posao koju nije mogao odbiti - preseljenje banke iz 1906. Zgrada je visoka čak 9 metara i teška gotovo 100 tona. Čeka ga težak posao. (S1, Ep11)

programme.title: Prijevoz brvnara
Cabin Truckers
programme.desc: Pat Ross je besplatno nabavio kuću za svoju kćer. Sad je mora preseliti 460 km dalje kroz Calgary prometnim cestama i poljima punim stoke i ograda na novu lokaciju. (S1, Ep5)

programme.title: Engineered
programme.desc: Zašto su staklene boce glavni sastojak u proizvodnji staklenih boca? Koliko je krumpira potrebno da bi se proizvela vrećica čipsa? Saznajte u ovoj epizodi emisije "Projektirano"

programme.title: Divlji zapad s Rayom Mearsom

programme.desc: Ray u dramatičnom pustinjskom krajoliku saznaje kako biljke i životinje preživljavaju bez vode te kako je taj zastrašujući teren postao savršeno utočište za bandite

programme.title: Životinjska siročad Paula O'Gradyja

programme.title: Planet Europa i dalje

programme.desc: Najveća životinjska migracija na svijetu: iz Kenije u Tanzaniju i natrag. Migracija gnuova najveći je egzodus životinjskoga svijeta. Prikazujemo vam je u ovom intrigantnom dokumentarcu o afričkoj savani

programme.title: Osvajači

programme.title: Čuvari tajni
programme.desc: Bivši šefovi izraelske agencije za unutrašnju sigurnost, poznate kao Shin Bet, prvi put se javno osvrću na svoje postupke i odluke te iznose svoje viđenje situacije. Od Šestodnevnog rata iz 1967. godine Izrael nije postigao uspjeh u preobrazbi razarajuće vojne pobjede u trajni mir. Tokom cijelog tog perioda ovi šefovi Shin Beta nalazili su se u samom centru procesa donošenja odluka u vezi sa pitanjima koja se tiču sigurnosti. Usko su sarađivali sa svim izraelskim premijerima. Njihove procjene i shvatanja su imali, a i dalje imaju, veliki utjecaj na izraelsku politiku. U razgovoru rasvjetljavaju kontroverzu u vezi sa okupacijom u periodu nakon Šestodnevnog rata

programme.title: Nedjelja 13.
programme.desc: Dokumentarni film «Nedjelja 13.» se bavi događajima na nikada odigranoj utakmici Dinamo - Crvena Zvezda prije tačno 25 godina, 13. maja 1990. godine. Prikazali smo šta se događalo na maksimirskom stadionu, ali i van njega uoči početka utakmice. Svoje poglede i sjećanja vezano za ovaj događaj iznose mjerodavne osobe - navijači s obje strane (Dinamovi i navijači Crvene Zvezde), službenici (pripadnici tadašnjih milicijskih jedinica, voditelji osiguranja same utakmice, predstavnici klubova), ali i igrači obje momčadi. Namjera filma je predstaviti svjedočanstva učesnika događaja, od kojih većina, bar do danas, javnosti nije poznata

programme.title: Širom svijeta
programme.desc: U poređenju s drugim telekomunikacijskim tehnologijama, sateliti su najsigurniji. Broj zahtjeva za korištenjem usluga vještačkih satelita u ogromnom je porastu. Danas je bez njih nemoguće zamisliti život. Njihov nestanak značio bi i obustavljanje međunarodnih razgovora, prestanak rada satelitskih TV kanala, kao i telekomunikacijskog sektora. U saobraćaju bismo se odrekli prednosti Globalnog sistema za pozicioniranje. Međutim, u primjeni te tehnologije postoje vlade pojedinih zemalja koje ometanjem satelitskog signala žele uvesti cenzuru. U današnjem svijetu sistem telekomunikacija i satelitskog prijenosa signala u stalnom je porastu. Kako i na koji način se ta tehnologija razvijala, saznat ćemo u novom izdanju serijala ' Širom svijeta'

programme.title: Tragom Putinove Rusije
programme.desc: Vladimir Putin, predsjednik koji suverno vlada Rusijom, slovi za najmoćnijeg čovjeka u toj zemlji i za jednog od najutjecajnih političara na planeti. U četiri dijela serijala, donosimo priče iz te zemlje, gdje smo se na mjestu događaja uvjerili u moć Putinove Rusije. Razgovarali smo s mnogim Rusima i postavljali pitanje zašto većina voli Putina, glasa za njega i šta zapravo stanovnici žele za sebe i svoju zemlju, te kakva je uloga Putina u tome? U drugom dijelu serijala istražujemo kako ekonomska kriza potresa Rusiju? Kako se građani Rusije snalaze u novonastaloj situaciji, ko je odgovoran za ekonomsku krizu i pad vrijednosti rublje? Je li za to odgovoran Zapad, zbog uvođenja sankcija Rusiji kao posljedice njene uloge u sukobu u Ukrajini? Treba li odgovornost tražiti u padu cijena nafte na globalnom svjetskom tržištu, korupciji ili zaostavštini komunističke privrede

programme.title: Hoću kući
programme.desc: Stručnjak za umjetnu inteligenciju i bivši uposlenik Googlea Igor Trajkovski i glumac svjetskog glasa i vječni boem Rade Šerbedžija govore o povratku zemlji i porodici, kao i ulozi koju mediji mogu imati u tom procesu. Igor nam opisuje kako je, baveći se idejom povratka u Makedoniju, za vlastite potrebe napravio news-agregator kako bi dobio što objektivniju sliku stanja u državi, a danas je to najpopularniji internetski portal u državi s tendencijom da osvoji i regiju. Na sebi svojstven način, Rade govori o putovanjima po svijetu i svojim mnogim "domovima", te nas, sa kćerkom Ninom, vodi tamo gdje se najviše osjeća "kod kuće" - uz kamin u prelijepoj istarskoj kamenoj kući

programme.title: Hoću kući
programme.desc: Primorje i planinski predjeli spajaju se u ovoj epizodi u kojoj čujemo priče Crnogorca profesora IVANA L. ZUBERA i Slovenca JURE FRANKA. Obojica vrhunski sportaši govore kako je bilo živjeti u Italiji gdje je gospodin Zuber trenirao plivače velike Rome ili u Japanu u kojem je skijaš i osvajač olimpijskog srebra Franko dugo godina radio kao glasnogovornik. Govore nam o tome koliko su njihove zemlje imale pozitivnog ili negativnog utjecaja na njihov povratak, a sve to vodeći nas kroz sunčane predjele Herceg-Novog ili kroz šarmantnu jezgru slovenskog gradića Radovljice

programme.title: Nedjelja 13.
programme.desc: Dokumentarni film «Nedjelja 13.» se bavi događajima na nikada odigranoj utakmici Dinamo - Crvena Zvezda prije tačno 25 godina, 13. maja 1990. godine. programme.title: Ljudi i moć
programme.desc: Gledamo iza kulisa kolumbijskih pobunjenika, dok se bliži kraj 50. godine sukoba

programme.title: Indijska bolnica
programme.desc: Ovaj dokumentarni serijal baca novo svjetlo na indijsko društvo. U šest jednosatnih epizoda prikazuju se složenost i nedoumice savremene Indije kroz živote pacijenata i medicinskog osoblja u bolničkom kompleksu 'Narayana Hrudayalaya' u Bangaloreu. U trećoj epizodi pitamo se može li Indija postati prva zemlja na svijetu koja razdvaja zdravstvo od bogatstva

programme.title: Regioskop - Čistači
programme.desc: U Grčkoj, državi koja se suočava sa finansijskim i socijalnim krahom, neonacistička stranka Zlatna zora postala je glavni „ispušni ventil za gnjev javnosti. Na prethodnim izborima jedva su se registrovali, a na onim iz 2012. dobili su čak 7% glasova birača i prvi put ušli u grčki parlament. Film prati grupu članova Zlatne zore tokom njihove predizborne kampanje u centru Atine. Njihova politika mržnje, prezira i potrage za „žrtvenim jarcima redovna je na ulicama grčkog glavnog grada. Nemilosrdni su u svom lovu na „krivce za probleme u Grčkoj. Trebaju im žrtve

programme.title: Širom svijeta
programme.desc: Metode u istragama koje koriste izraelske unutrašnje sigurnosne službe u najmanju ruku su kontroverzne. Izraelska unutrašnja služba sigurnosti Shin Bet, ili Shabak, jedna je od tri glavne službe sigurnosnog aparata. Kroz lične ispovijesti dva bivša Shin Bet pritvorenika, Al Jazeera World ispituje kontroverzne organizacijske metode, ovlasti i historiju te službe

programme.title: Moj život - SATNE
programme.desc: Svakog mjeseca nekoliko stotina kontejnera elektronskog otpada iz zapadnih zemalja stiže u Agbogbloshie, nekadašnje ribarsko mjesto u blizini Accre, glavnog i najvećeg grada Gane, uzrokujući zagađenja i uništenja okoliša. Ta se zemlja ubraja među najveća svjetska odlagališta elektronskog otpada

programme.title: Jači od riječi
programme.desc: U sedmici posvećenoj gluhonijemim osobama Al Jazeera prikazuje film o životu gluhonijemih u Palestini. Kako žive, imaju li pomoć od države, koliko su zakonski ravnopravni sa osobama koje čuju? Kako se integrišu u društvo? Kako doživljavaju opsadu i život u ratnom okruženju

programme.title: Priče s Istoka
programme.desc: Može li domicilno stanovništvo Rapanui na Uskršnjem otoku, koje je polinezijskog porijekla, dobiti bitku za nezavisnost od Čilea, kako bi zaštitili svoju zemlju i kulturu? Njihovi poznati monolitni Moai kipovi simbol su zagonetne prošlosti ovog dijela planete Zemlje

programme.title: Reprint Čede Kapora
programme.desc: Godine 1938. u Barceloni mladi interbrigadist i antifašist Čedo Kapor ušetao je u štamparski kolektiv i ugledao knjigu. Želio ju je kupiti po svaku cijenu, ali nije imao konzervu mesa koliko je koštala. Nakon što je sutradan saznao da je posljednji primjerak prodan, počeo je potragu! Sudbina Čede Kapora i knjige ukrsitit će se i neraskidivo vezati, a ubrzo kreću na opasno, neizvjesno, ali i uzbudljivo putovanje

programme.title: Širom svijeta

programme.title: Većina počinje ovdje
programme.desc: Film prati šest mladih ljudi iz bivših jugoslovenskih republika dok putujući regionom istražuju uticaj ratova s kraja prošlog vijeka na njihove živote i budućnost

programme.title: Lica Kine
programme.desc: Fengjiang se nalazi južno od Šangaja. Taj grad poznat je po najvećem odlagališu električne i elektroničke opreme u Kini. Iz godine u godinu ono raste, a prema posljednjem izvještaju UN-a, predviđa se da će do 2020. ta vrsta otpada iz Kine biti uvećana za čak 400%. U filmu pratimo svakodnevicu običnih radnika u tim odlagalištima, kao i na koji način obavljaju posao te kakvi su im radni uvjeti

programme.title: Moj život
programme.desc: Pratimo ambicioznu tinejdžerku Suzete Sangula koja se bori za prava žena u Mozambiku

programme.title: Hoću kući
programme.desc: Primorje i planinski predjeli spajaju se u ovoj epizodi u kojoj čujemo priče Crnogorca profesora IVANA L. ZUBERA i Slovenca JURE FRANKA. Obojica vrhunski sportaši govore kako je bilo živjeti u Italiji gdje je gospodin Zuber trenirao plivače velike Rome ili u Japanu u kojem je skijaš i osvajač olimpijskog srebra Franko dugo godina radio kao glasnogovornik. programme.title: Vrhovi Balkana
programme.desc: Osim Julijskih, svoje mjesto u srcima Slovenaca svakako imaju i Kamniško-Savinjske Alpe. Smještene na granici s Austrijom, te su planine ljupka poveznica dviju zemalja. Zašto je planinarenje u kulturi odrastanja gotovo svakog Slovenca, otkriva Bojan Rotovnik, predsjednik Planinarskog saveza Slovenije, koji je s 55.000 članova najmoćnija nevladina organizacija u zemlji. Na najviši vrh Grintovec David i Polona penju se bosi. Idući s njima, saznajemo da su čak osnovali sportsko društvo „Bosa noga, čiji članovi smatraju da im cipele samo smetaju. Davo Karničar, jedini čovjek na svijetu koji je bez prekida skijao čak s vrha Mount Everesta, otkriva planove kojima iznova pomjera granice ljudskih mogućnosti. Kako ptice vide Alpe, opisuje nam Matevž Lenarčič, svjetski rekorder u letu ultralakim avionima. Na Kamniško-Savinjskim Alpama sagrađen je i prvi futuristički bivak, pokazujemo ekskluzivne snimke njegove gradnje i pogled koji se pamti cijeli život(c)
